ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sqrth.1 | |- A e. RR |
| 2 |  | sqr11.1 | |- B e. RR |
| 3 |  | sqrmuli.1 | |- 0 <_ A |
| 4 |  | sqrmuli.2 | |- 0 <_ B |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_sqrtmuli | |- ( ( 0 <_ A /\ 0 <_ B ) -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) x. ( sqrt ` B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- ( sqrt ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) x. ( sqrt ` B ) ) |
